hints: This 2022 Rom-Com movie revolves around religious boundaries.
Hero works in an ad agency and Heroine is a professional photographer.
Both Hero & Heroine come from strict, orthodox families of different religions.
Both Hero & Heroine tell 2 different lies to convince their families.
Heroine dreams of having her wedding on Amelia Island.
This 2016 thriller revolves around a mysterious kidnapping case.
Hero is an NRI who returns to India.
Hero helps his ex-girlfriend find her missing daughter.
Everyone around believes the heroine has a psychological disorder.
This film was remade in multiple languages, most popularly in Hindi as Baaghi 2.
This 2019 dark comedy-thriller revolves around three close friends.
The hero is a delivery boy struggling with money problems.
He tries to steal ₹500 from an old lady during a delivery.
He unexpectedly finds ₹10 lakhs in his delivery bags.
He gets stuck in a murder and drug case inside an apartment.
